content: for this pattern i used adlibris cotton mercerized in 3 colors and a 3 0 mm hook but you can use any yarn with a suitable hook feel free to use as many or few colors as you like finished size approx 34 cm/13 in in diameter after blocking skill level intermediate stitches used single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet fpsc/double_crochet bpsc/double_crochet popcorn picot dccl dctog #blueberryhillmandala
